content.query:
-----------------------------
-----CREATE CREDENTIAL FOR DPOOL------
------------------------------

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL karurcreds_dedicatedpool
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'

----------------------------------
--- CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE FOR DPOOL---
-----------------------------------

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE raw_external_source_dp_abfss1
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'abfss://bronze@azuresynpasedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net',
    CREDENTIAL = karurcreds_dedicatedpool
)

--------------------------------------------------------
---CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE FOR DPOOL--------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE parquet_table_dpool
(
     Dealer_ID  VARCHAR(4000),
    Model_ID   VARCHAR(4000),
    Branch_ID  VARCHAR(4000),
    Date_ID    VARCHAR(4000),
    Units_Sold BIGINT,
    Revenue    BIGINT
)
WITH
(
   LOCATION ='/bronze/cetas_revenue',
   DATA_SOURCE = raw_external_source_dp_abfss,
   FILE_FORMAT = parquet_format_dpool
)
